data.name: EmailAddressBeingUsed

data.name: PasswordSet

data.name: Emails_ForgotPassword_Body
data.value:
The word on the street is you lost your password. Sorry to hear it! If you haven't forgotten your password you can safely ignore this email. Your password has not been changed.
Click the following link within the next hour to reset your password:
[{0}]({0})
Thanks, The {1} Team

data.name: Emails_ForgotPassword_Subject
data.value: [{0}] Please reset your password.

data.name: Emails_SetPassword_Body
data.value:
The word on the street is you want to set a password for your account. If you didn't request a password, you can safely ignore this message. A password has not yet been set.
Click the following link within the next hour to set your password:
[{0}]({0})
Thanks, The {1} Team

data.name: Emails_SetPassword_Subject
data.value: [{0}] Please set your password.

data.name: Emails_CredentialAdded_Body
data.value: A {0} was added to your account and can now be used to log in. If you did not request this change, please reply to this email to contact support.

data.name: Emails_CredentialAdded_Subject
data.value: [{0}] {1} added to your account

data.name: Emails_CredentialRemoved_Body
data.value: A {0} was removed from your account and can no longer be used to log in. If you did not request this change, please reply to this email to contact support.

data.name: Emails_CredentialRemoved_Subject
data.value: [{0}] {1} removed from your account
